handleMonthRadio() - Method in class controller.CustomerForm
LAMBDA EXPRESSION is used here to convert appointment start timestamp to a localDateTime which can then be used to check if the appointment occurs in the selected month; eliminating the need for creating a separate variable or conversion after the fact.

handleWeekRadio() - Method in class controller.CustomerForm
